seo.pageTitle: Effortless Crypto Swapping and Token Exchange on MetaMask
seo.pageDescription: Secure and Cost-Effective Crypto Exchanges: Swap Digital Tokens Easily with MetaMask.

node.headline: You’re in control when you access, store and swap your tokens

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Get competitive prices from
various liquidity sources.
Review our official contracts audit
MetaMask Swaps combines data from decentralized exchange aggregators, market makers, and DEXs, to ensure you get competitive quotes with the lowest network fees that Swaps can find for your trade.

modules.title: Introducing MetaMask Swaps for Mobile and Desktop

childMarkdownRemark.html: MetaMask is built to be privacy-first. We empower you to access, store and swap tokens, without having to worry about dapps or exchanges accessing more personal data than you’ve consented to give. Whether you’re participating in decentralized finance, or surfing Web 3.0, with MetaMask, you are in control of your data.

Swaps ensures that you always have access to a large selection of tokens and competitive prices, by providing prices from multiple aggregators and individual market makers in one place. A service fee of 0.875% is automatically factored into each quote, which supports ongoing development to make MetaMask even better.

We pursue a different path to locate competitive trades. Each route requires a varying amount of gas fees to execute the transaction. Swaps sources competitive prices and determines which liquidity source is gas efficient for every trade.
With Swaps, you only need to approve each token once to gain access to available liquidity across DeFi, reducing time and gas costs.

Large swaps are often subject to wild price swings when there is insufficient liquidity available on a particular DEX. When swapping tokens with MetaMask, orders are spread across multiple DEXs to reduce slippage impact on the final price.
